In case anyone is cleaning out their attic soon...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2006 Topics (Year of the Mercury Drop): In case anyone is cleaning out their attic soon...
By Lisa Shock on Monday, December 25, 2006 - 06:21 pm:

My mom is looking to get her hands on any sets of old Christmas lights that match hers, in an effort to keep them going.

These lights were purchased around 1965, someplace in the South (US), at a regular retailer. They are the small size bulbs, with yellow plastic lollipops with white sticks snapped over them.

By now, if they have been in continuous use, people have probably replaced the original wires. If you have an old set, be assured we won't use them as is, we intend to just harvest the lollipops to put on a string of LEDs.

If you find some, and wish to sell them, email me.
